DOC.criteria: Demonstrates understand study procedure , restriction willingness participate evidenced voluntary write informed consent ( see Appendices 24 ) receive sign date copy inform consent form . Participant male Good general mental health assess health questionnaire , opinion investigator medically qualify designee , clinically significant relevant abnormality medical history upon oral examination . As well absence condition would impact participant 's safety wellbeing affect individual 's ability understand follow study procedures requirement . Participants fully brief prior agree participate study research team confirm willing , able , likely comply procedure complete study . Only follow individual recruit participant study : Group 1 : Resistance trained individual ( ≥3 session per week ≥2 year minimum 1 session per week include legbased exercise ) . Group 2 : Trained cyclist ( compete minimum Category 3 roadracing/ estimate 10 mile TT < 25 minute train history ≥5 hour per week ≥2 year ) . Group 3 : Team sport player ( minimum University 1st team level e.g . soccer , rugby union , rugby league , hockey , basketball , play competitively ≥1x per week ≥2 year ) . Individuals fit training status inclusion criterion . Current use nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAID 's ) analgesic pain relief . Participation another clinical study receipt investigational drug within 30 day screen visit . Previous participation study . Recent history ( within last 1 year ) alcohol substance abuse . An employee sponsor study site member immediate family . Have heart medical condition may contraindicate participant take part high intensity exhaustive physical activity .
